page.title: 17CHICHESTER-SPORT & LEISURE
page.content: Sports clubs and facilities exist in {Oaklands,Priory & Jubilee}parks.Public and club facilities are available for- football, rugby,tennis,squash, hockey, cricket, bowls,archery, putting & open air chess.Sports like cricket have a long history here. There is a small fitness centre at Northgate.Within the city exist many clubs and societies to meet all interests. {The Fernleigh {Centre }provides a meeting place for various courses & small functions.{The {Chichester Festival Theatre }has a season of four plays from May-Sept and other entertainment during the rest of the year. To the South lies the coast and{Chichester Harbour}where all water sports are enjoyed. The surrounding countryside especially the{North Downs is a good area for walking and riding. At{Goodwood Terrena}flying and driving tuition are available. {
